snippet: Garmin's new fitness watch, the Swim, is made specifically for use in a pool and is designed to automatically log laps, strokes, pace, distance and calories burned. In a test though, the watch didn't quite turn in a gold-medal performance.
abstract: Garmin's new fitness watch, the Swim, is made specifically for use in a pool and is designed to automatically log laps, strokes, pace, distance and calories burned. In a test though, the watch didn't quite turn in a gold-medal performance.

headline.main: Drowning in Features, a Watch for the Pool
headline.print_headline: A Watch Counts Your Laps And Knows Your Strokes
